pullrequest.title: Load GUI Plugins with gzclient parameter -g, fixes issue 1311

content.raw:
mm actually I think the `Load` function is called in all the different types of gazebo plugins so it's kind of inconsistent that gui INI's GUI plugins don't call `Load` even if an empty sdf element is passed in. Does it cause any problems if `Load` is called?

The changes here look good to me. I wonder if we can reduce duplicate code by putting this function in `RenderWidget` and update the RenderWidget constructor code that loads gui plugins in gui.ini file to also call this function.
content.html:
mm actually I think the Load function is called in all the different types of gazebo plugins so it's kind of inconsistent that gui INI's GUI plugins don't call Load even if an empty sdf element is passed in. Does it cause any problems if Load is called?

The changes here look good to me. I wonder if we can reduce duplicate code by putting this function in RenderWidget and update the RenderWidget constructor code that loads gui plugins in gui.ini file to also call this function.
